title: chrisjourney89

content: I can video tape it.Â  Who wants to see this.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: If you want someone to watch it, just post it on social media or video sharing platforms like YouTube. And let the people know your link so they can just watch whether they like it or not. Stand up comedy is somehow what is being shown on my fed and that's why if you want someone to watch you, just upload.
